body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Jessamine County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Fathergill Broaddus in Madison County on May 29, 1845. Father of Andrew Broaddus, John Broaddus, Reuben M. Broaddus, Mary Broaddus, Thomas Broaddus, Nancy M. Broaddus, Elizabeth Broaddus, Beverly Broaddus. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860.
